src: left window left furniture left chair
tgt: Walk past the large picture and chair. Walk past the dining room table turn right into the hallway and stop.

src: right door left bed left window right door
tgt: Walk to the foot of the bed and to a little sitting area.  Go through the door on the left side.  Stop once you have stepped into the bathroom.

src: left refrigerator left door left counter straight towards door straight towards window
tgt: Go straight and slightly right toward the glass table and white chairs. Pass the table and head straight, pass the couches and go into the room straight ahead. Wait by the bed.

src: left tv left door
tgt: Go stand behind the middle kitchen island chair.

src: left door left couch left window
tgt: Walk behind the couch and turn left.  Stop beside the middle stool.

src: left tv right door
tgt: Walk straight, and when you reach the end of the table turn right.  Wait by the brass chairs.

src: left counter straight towards door left mirror left door
tgt: Walk straight through the living room with the couch on your right. Go through the doorway into the bedroom at the end of the walkway. In the bedroom take a left and stop in the entry way just before the rug.

src: left door left door left window
tgt: Exit the shower and go into the room then turn right to exit the bedroom. Head toward the beige couches and wait near the blue rug with the three round coffee tables.

src: left window left window left mirror left door
tgt: Walk forward in the direction of the dining room. Veer right, and go down the hall into the bathroom. Stop in front of the sink.

src: left bed left window left window left door
tgt: Go in the left side door and go passed the sinks and stop in the doorway.

src: straight towards door straight towards door left chair
tgt: Walk forward past he living room, into the dining room. Stop in the doorway to the bedroom.

src: left door left couch left window left door
tgt: Go straight then turn right. Pass the bed then turn left pass the shower on the right and the sink on the right and wait by the toilet.

src: left door left window left window left window
tgt: Move forward and turn left. Your goal is ahead, move forward until you reach it.

src: left bed left window left door left refrigerator left door
tgt: Turn right walk out doorway. Turn right walk towards bathroom. Turn right walk past bathroom. Turn left, stop in front of bar stools.

src: left door left door left couch left window
tgt: Turn so the wall is on your right and the furniture is on your left. Then go forward until you're past the furniture. Turn left and move forward until you're next to the kitchen pass through on your right.

src: left toilet straight towards door straight towards door straight towards window
tgt: Walk out of the bathroom and turn right. Stop in front of the bed.

src: left toilet left door straight towards door
tgt: walk towards robe, through doorway, turn right towards bed, turn right and stop in doorway.

src: right window
tgt: Walk through the door. Turn left. Walk past the table. Turn left. Stop next to the bar stools.

src: left window right window left window left door
tgt: Walk past the dining table and take a left into the hallway. In the hallway walk into the bathroom and stop on the rug.

src: left tv
tgt: Walk to left of the dinning table and make a right at the end of the table and another right and walk to the middle of the table and wait there.

src: left bed left bed left door left door
tgt: Exit the room and turn left into the bathroom.

src: left couch left chair left door
tgt: Exit the wet bar, walk straight ahead and wait in the bathroom at the end.

src: left bed left bed left door left door
tgt: Go between the two tables and through the doorway and go to your left to the sink.

src: left window right window left potted plant left window
tgt: Walk across living room, turn left and enter super cool theater room.

src: left door straight towards window left door left door
tgt: walk behind couch to bedroom on right, in front of couch turn left and enter bathroom,  stop at vanity mirror.

src: left bed left door left refrigerator
tgt: Exit the room, and turn right.  Immediately turn right and walk towards the long glass table.  Wait here.

src: right door left bed left window right door
tgt: Walk into the bedroom, around the bed, and stop right next to the open doorway.
